subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:
Study on the restoration of  cultural heritage in the northern part of Cyprus to include:
- Review of the existing inventories already carried out by other donors.
- Ranking methodology in order to prioritise monuments for which the detailed assessment would be carried out.
- Detailed assessment of built heritage:
a. Overall assessment of the cultural heritage monuments in the northern part of Cyprus
b. Ad hoc assessment of the built heritage of the Walled City of Famagusta 
c. Ad hoc  assessment of the  immovable heritage in Cyprus,  built  during  the Ottoman period (1571-1914)
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Study of Cultural Heritage CYP

title: Study on restoration of cultural heritage in Norther CYP
